title: This Is The Life
lyrics:
[intro]  (Em) (C) (G) (Bm) 
 
Oh the (Em)wind whistles down
The (C)cold dark street tonight 
And the (G)people they were dancing 
(Bm) To the music vibe 
And the (Em)boys chase the girls with the curls in their hair 
While the (C)shy tormented youth sit way over there 
And the (G)songs they get louder each one better than be(Bm)fore 

[chorus]
And you're singing the (Em)songs, thinking this is the life 
And you wake up in the (C)morning and you're head feels twice the size 
Where you gonna go? (G)Where you gonna go? 
Where you gonna sleep to-(Bm)night?
And you're singing the (Em)songs, thinking this is the life 
And you wake up in the (C)morning and you're head feels twice the size 
Where you gonna go? (G)Where you gonna go? 
Where you gonna sleep to(Bm)night?
Where you gonna sleep to-(Em, kazoo)night? (C) (G) (Bm) 
  
So you're (Em)heading down the road in your taxi for four 
And you're (C)waiting outside Jimmy's front door 
But (G)nobody's in and nobody's home 'til (Bm) four 
So you're (Em)sitting there with nothing to do 
Talking a(C)bout Robert Riger and his motley crew 
And (G)where you're gonna go and where you're gonna sleep to-(Bm)night 

[chorus]
And you're singing the (Em)songs, thinking this is the life 
And you wake up in the (C)morning and you're head feels twice the size 
Where you gonna go? (G)Where you gonna go? 
Where you gonna sleep to-(Bm)night?
And you're singing the (Em)songs, thinking this is the life 
And you wake up in the (C)morning and you're head feels twice the size 
Where you gonna go? (G)Where you gonna go? 
Where you gonna sleep to-(Bm)night?
Where you gonna sleep to-(Em, kazoo)night? (C) (G) (Bm) 
(Em) (C) (G) (Bm) 

[chorus]
[single strum] And you're singing the (Em)songs, thinking this is the life 
And you wake up in the (C)morning and you're head feels twice the size 
Where you gonna go? (G)Where you gonna go? 
Where you gonna sleep to-(Bm)night?
[normal strum] And you're singing the (Em)songs, thinking this is the life 
And you wake up in the (C)morning and you're head feels twice the size 
Where you gonna go? (G)Where you gonna go? 
Where you gonna sleep to-(Bm)night?
Where you gonna sleep to-(Em, kazoo)night? (C) (G) (Bm) 
(Em) (C) (G) (Bm)
(Em) [end]
